DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to compare the comfort of three commercially available contact lenses.
DOC.brief_title: A Clinical Study Comparing the Comfort of Three Commercially Available Contact Lenses
DOC.criteria: Be at least 18 years old Have provided written informed consent Have discomfort when wearing contact lenses Have an active ocular infection or significant slit lamp findings Participated in any other studies in the past 30 days
